description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.themes.Item.Y6wJpc2ra3bSJ905]{Biotechnician}

You never seem to get tired, even when working longer and harder than everyone else in pursuit of your mark; some of your targets might even refer to you as a tireless ghost or an all-seeing hunter. You can walk or be otherwise active for 12 hours instead of 8 before needing to attempt Constitution checks for a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.2mmspP39EOiog9zD.JournalEntryPage.R3i6OiFN896CROre#forced-march]{forced march} (see page 258), and you can @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.2mmspP39EOiog9zD.JournalEntryPage.R3i6OiFN896CROre#hustle]{hustle} for 2 hours a day during overland travel (see page 258) instead of 1 hour. Reduce the penalty for @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.UDTsEIldhXTn0VJA#follow-tracks]{following tracks} using @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.UDTsEIldhXTn0VJA]{Survival} while moving at double speed to â€“10.
